nodes.text: The Harrin Trade Corridor, also known as the Harrin Run, was a hyperspace route that connected Harrin sector in the Inner Rim to Merkat in the Expansion Region.
Systems along the way included Cerenia system, Lazerian system, Arrgaw system and Lohopa system.
The Kira Run split off towards Kira, which continued into the Enarc Run.
